name: Kaushal Lokuarachchi
bio: Kaushal Samaraweera Lokuarachchi (born May 20, 1982 in Ratnapura , Sri Lanka), or Kaushal Lokuarachchi, is a former Sri Lankan cricketer, who played all formats. He is a right-handed batsman and a legbreak bowler. He was banned by BPL anti-corruption tribunal for 18 months and not involved in cricket since then.[1]
